text: EXACTLY what I thought of.

text: Putting a five year old on the drum is going to set some crazy time signatures.

text: Or they will just end up sounding lots like Sun-Ra.

text: Well here's a two year old that does pretty well for himself: http://music.todaysbigthing.com/2010/01/15

text: A comment left by tellumo was marked lame too many times and excluded. (marked lame by waddie, whoper, waldo913, Sweetlips, logic)

text: A comment left by zem was marked lame too many times and excluded. (marked lame by fell, erributtz, c2, godfatherofsouls, Fcannon, ford, tellumo, morbo, Darthemed)

name: dropkickpikachu
text: A comment left by dropkickpikachu was marked lame too many times and excluded. (marked lame by c_dizzle, erributtz, antecen, c2, Taidje_Khan, Fcannon, Boredom_Man, tellumo, morbo, SotiCoto)

name: heccibiggs
text: I guess the exact same six people who lamed your comment.

name: achilleselbow
text: A comment left by achilleselbow was marked lame too many times and excluded. (marked lame by ted0phile, johnnybaverage, waddie, dismas)

name: ford
text: Disparaging the use of a stupid internet thing and then immediately using an emoticon is kind of lame, in my opinion.

name: radarjammer
text: Invisible lamers are still lame. I, for example am leaving you a friendly note to say I lamed you.

name: ford
text: Leaving a friendly little note to describe why you lamed my friendly little note describing why I lamed zem?  Not cool, dude.

name: soticoto
text:
I can't lame anything any more.
Would if I could.
Oh hell would I.
I hate most stuff.

name: heccibiggs
text: No one asked you.

name: soticoto
text:
You say that as though it would make any difference .

For that matter no-one asked you either. But y'know, that isn't terribly informative either way.

name: carbonation
text: Clearly the answer is to begin leaving messages consisting of nothing but "lame" beneath comments which warrant that reaction. As people are no longer able to lame comments, these "lame"s will be even more indelible than the well-integrated function they replace.

name: jollysaintpete
text: I am agreeing so hard my sack is quivering, ford

name: jonmw
text: I'm agreeing with you so hard that my asshole is PUCKERING

name: aperson
text: I remember back when people could agree without disgusting things happening to their below-waists. it was a better time

name: scorpio_nadir
text: Snide courtesy. Is...is that a...Thing?

name: deimosrising
text: Bonus points for Devo.

name: em2
text: This and the Geordi LaForge visor made out of an air-conditioner filter.

name: aliiis
text: and the 80s too-large suit jacket with rolled up sleeves paired with skinny black tie, surely?

name: jaredwilde
text: No way, it is all about Teo's (I do not know how make the little e thingy) intense mohawk. Hardkore

name: cpnglxynchos
text: it is better not to make with the accento. it ends in tears and HUGE cusses at assetbar.

name: cracklewater
text:
Those Geordie-glasses were a genuine 80s style thang, long before TNG.
I am older than I admit.

name: agika
text: This comic gets bonus points for synaesthetic effect: when I look at the last two panels, I hear cheesy rock music.

name: centipede_damascus
text: A comment left by centipede_damascus was marked lame too many times and excluded. (marked lame by EM2, aquamuffin, Wolfslice)

name: captain_arlo
text: Put that in your pipe and smoke it!

name: berami
text: Seems to me like something Phillipe would come up with.  No one else had time to argue with him.

name: hollis
text: Does anyone have any idea what Roast Beef's hat is made of?

name: tellumo
text: Wire, duct tape, and red paper.

name: hollis
text: Awesome!  I think I must make one now.

text: Oh man, mad chubbies for cockeyed link.

name: stuart
text: Dude, it's totally injecton-molded plastic .

text: Brilliant...

text: AGH LINK DOES NOT WORK AGAIN! DEVO STORE IS SUCH MOVINK TARGET

text: Last panel last panel last panel!!!

text: philippe looks so happy.

text: Is that Teodor's sample Circus Penis Army helmet? Or just some crazy hair?

text: I think it's supposed to be a Mohawk. The question is, how did he grow it so quickly?

name: stuart
text: wig

name: tekende
text: Through sheer force of will.

name: anzio
text: Chubby for possible Dr. McNinja reference.

text: Beef has hella depression but that ain't no thing right now.

text: Lyle and Teodor switch places.

name: cousinted
text:
Now that I got that over with
I'll just play my imaginary guitar again

name: dasilodavi
text: Elektronik.  Supersonik.

name: juanclaudius
text: Holy shit. I just started this band the other day. I started it with three guys who never play music with each other, playing instruments we don't actually know how to play. I'm playing keyboard. I get to be Beef.

name: johnnybaverage
text: So...how did it turn out?

name: gazdatronik
text: Roast beef has the Radio Shack Concertmate MG-1.

name: joebot
text: I imagine Roast Beef's voice sounding a lot like Jonathan Richman during this introduction. In fact, when you think about it, he pretty much is the Jonathan Richman of anthropomorphic cats.

name: rowboat
text: Beef thinks Don Johnson is the same as New Wave.

name: gopacapulco
text: devo hat is priceless

name: soticoto
text:
This strip is Instant 5/5 ... Didn't even have to think about it.
I usually only give fives to Philippe Suffering strips... but this just totes too much win.

name: heccibiggs
text: I love that, even though Pat's such a dick, they're all still his friends and willing to rescue him when he's making a horrific fool of himself in front of a large audience.

name: drago25
text:
"We decided on this name in less than three minutes America" made this for me.

That and Phillipe being on drums, its achingly appropriate.

name: em2
text: Phillipe has been wearing his Batman PJ's for something on the order of three or four days straight by this point.

name: skaterpix
text: I love how T has a Mohawk!

name: radarjammer
text:
Billy/Phllipe should be on lead guitar


wut the f

name: singtralala
text: best live act ever. well, maybe the tenmen.

name: jollysaintpete
text: Devo just sued McDonalds for using their trademark hat on a character named New Age Ned that came with happy meals. Watch out, Onstad.

name: cpnglxynchos
text: this or the next strip will be the next strip i make with the purchasing of.

name: talbain
text: Hey, KG and me wrote this song 5 minutes ago. It's called "Master Exploder".

name: ih8jonmayr
text: ACE OF SPADES!!!

name: sex_bicycle
text: a true rocker doesn't let a thing like depression get in the way of a good show EVER!

name: duperando
text:
Oh man, I can't get over the beauty of this strip--
5 seconds it takes for the crew to mobilize into some sort of techno/punk band, the amazingness of Roast Beef's intro, and also Roast Beef's outfit. It just makes me chuckle.

name: tbtabby
text: Wait...Teodor and Lyle aren't "musical strangers!"

name: anzio
text: They are to each other.
